tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to flow as water (i.e. to rain); transitively, to lay or throw (especially an arrow, i.e. to shoot); figuratively, to point out (as if by aiming the finger), to teach
tokens.translation: properly, to flow as water (i.e. to rain); transitively, to lay or throw (especially an arrow, i.e. to shoot); figuratively, to point out (as if by aiming the finger), to teach

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, a bubbling up, i.e. of water, a wave; of earth, mire or clay (cement); also a heap; hence, a chomer or dry measure
tokens.translation: properly, a bubbling up, i.e. of water, a wave; of earth, mire or clay (cement); also a heap; hence, a chomer or dry measure

tokens.resolved_gloss: to liken, i.e. (transitively) to use figurative language (an allegory, adage, song or the like); intransitively, to resemble

tokens.resolved_gloss: dust (as powdered or gray); hence, clay, earth, mud
